snippet: A Moroccan man suffocated while being smuggled into Spain by his brother in a suitcase in the trunk of a car on a ferry.
abstract: Authorities in Spain report Moroccan man suffocated in his brother’s suitcase traveling in car trunk aboard ferry sailing from Melilla, Spanish enclave in North Africa, to Almeria; authorities arrest brother in botched smuggling attempt.
lead_paragraph: A Moroccan man suffocated while being smuggled into Spain by his brother in a suitcase in the trunk of a car on a ferry.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Spain: Migrant Suffocates in Car

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
